Player History
Signed as a free agent by San Diego on 4/1/1985 to a minor league deal...
Released by San Diego on 5/17/1988...
Signed as a free agent by Chicago on 5/17/1988 to a minor league deal...
Had first career hit on 5/24/1988, off Tom Candiotti (PIT)...
Hit first career homerun on 5/24/1988, off Brett Gideon (PIT)...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1989...
Had 5 hits with 6 RBI against San Diego on 9/22/1990...
Won Player of the Week award on 9/25/1990, hitting .654 with 4 HR, 15 RBI...
Won Batter of the Month award on 10/1/1990, hitting .432 with 5 HR, 27 RBI...
Won Gold Glove Award at Catcher in 1990...
2/2/1991: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,542,857 through salary arbitration...
Had 5 hits with 1 RBI against Atlanta on 6/23/1991...
Was selected to the 1991 Allstar game...
2/2/1992: Gets a new one-year contract worth $3,542,857 through salary arbitration...
Injured on 5/14/1992 with a Inflamed Hamstring Muscle, out for 4 weeks...
Drove in 6 runs against Cincinnati on 7/20/1992...
8/1/1992: Signed a contract extension with Chicago, $4,000,000 per year, for 6 years.
Won World Series with Chicago in 1992...
